sentences.sContent: He might be influenced by nostalgia for the surroundings of his happy youth.
sentences.sCn: 他也许被他对快乐青年时代的环境的怀念影响了。

remMethod.val: nost(回家) + alg(痛) + ia(表病， 名词后缀) → 想回家想到心痛 → 思乡病

trans.tranCn: 思乡病， 乡愁； 怀旧之情， 恋旧
trans.tranOther: Nostalgia is an affectionate feeling you have for the past, especially for a particularly happy time
